sections.heading: Animate AI
sections.content: Introducing AnIMATE, our AI-Powered Email Booking Solution for Corporate Travel Companies! Are you tired of juggling multiple email inquiries and manually processing flight bookings for your corporate clients? Say hello to AnIMATE, our innovative AIpowered email booking solution designed to streamline and simplify the entire booking process.Key Features:1. Seamless Email Integration:Our AI seamlessly integrates with your corporate email system, automatically scanning and extracting flight booking requests from incoming emails.2. Intelligent Booking Recommendations:Leveraging advanced machine learning algorithms, our solution analyzes travel preferences, budget constraints, and corporate policies to provide personalized flight options tailored to each traveler’s needs.3. Automated Booking Confirmation:Once a suitable flight option is identified, our AI automatically generates booking confirmations, complete with itinerary details and ticket information, saving you valuable time and effort.4. Real-Time Updates and Notifications:Stay informed every step of the way with real-time updates and notifications on booking status, flight changes, and itinerary updates, ensuring seamless communication with your clients.5. Compliance and Reporting:Our solution ensures compliance with corporate travel policies by flagging any booking requests that fall outside predefined parameters. Additionally, comprehensive reporting capabilities provide insights into booking trends, traveler preferences, and expenditure analysis.Benefits:Efficiency: Streamline the booking process and reduce manual intervention, allowing your team to handle more bookings in less time.Personalization: Provide a tailored booking experience for each traveler, enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty.Cost Savings: Optimize travel spend by identifying the most cost-effective flight options while adhering to budget constraints and corporate policies.Accuracy: Minimize errors and discrepancies with automated booking confirmations and real-time updates, ensuring smooth travel experiences for your clients.Scalability: Scale your operations effortlessly to meet growing demand, with our AI handling booking requests efficiently and effectively. Join the ranks of leading corporate travel companies that are embracing the future of travel booking with our AI-powered email booking solution. Elevate your booking process, delight your clients, and drive efficiency and profitability in your business. Get in touch with us today to schedule a demo and experience the power of AI in corporate travel booking!

sections.heading: OLMS
sections.content: Are you looking for a comprehensive solution to streamline your airline booking operations while ensuring security, efficiency, and control? Look no further than OLMS – our cutting-edge Online Login Management System designed to revolutionize the way you manage agent usersand airline bookings.Here’s why OLMS is the ultimate solution for your business:1. Secured Login Credentials: Say goodbye to the hassle of managing and safeguarding login credentials. OLMS employs state-of-the-art technology to hide login credentials from agent users, enabling automatic login to airline websites securely.2. Multiple Supplier Login Credentials: With OLMS, you can effortlessly store and manage multiple supplier logins. This simplifies the login process for agents who need access to multiple suppliers, enhancing efficiency and productivity.3. Mapping Multiple Suppliers to a Single Agent: Empower your agents by enabling them to access multiple airlines within a single application. OLMS allows seamless mapping of multiple airlines to a single agent, eliminating the need for agents to remember specific login credentials for each airline.4. Limiting Bookings: Take control of your booking process with OLMS’s booking limit feature. Set limits for agent users based on booking amount and number of bookings. Once a user reaches their specified limit, the application automatically prevents them from booking additional tickets, ensuring compliance and preventing overspending.5. Page Restriction by Department: Tailor user access and permissions based on department or role with OLMS’s page restriction feature. For example, restrict access to the cancellation process for users who only have booking creation privileges. The application enforces these restrictions seamlessly, providing enhanced security and control.6. Reports and Activity Monitoring: Stay informed and in control with OLMS’s comprehensive reporting and activity monitoring capabilities. Detect and prevent illegal activities by agent users with detailed reports that track user activities and bookings. OLMS records all activities and generates insightful reports for further analysis and decision-making.7. Analytical Dashboard: Gain valuable insights and make data-driven decisions with OLMS’s Analytical Dashboard. With its powerful features, the Dashboard acts as a central hub for monitoring key performance indicators and driving business growth.In summary, OLMS offers a robust system for managing agent users, securing login credentials, controlling access, and monitoring activities within your airline booking operations. Experience unparalleled efficiency, security, and control with OLMS – the ultimate solution for your business needs.

sections.heading: IBE
sections.content: Welcome to the future of travel booking! At Resh and Thosh, we’re proud tointroduce our state-of-the-art Internet Booking Engine (IBE) – the ultimate solution to propel your travel business to unprecedented heights. Let’s explorehow our cutting-edge technology can revolutionize your operations and elevate the experience for your customers.Key Features:1. Dynamic Search and Booking Interface: – Our IBE boasts a sleek and intuitive interface, empowering users to effortlessly search, compare, and book flights, hotels, car rentals, and more, all within a seamless, user-friendly environment.2. Customization and Branding Options: – Tailor the look and feel of your IBE to perfectly align with your brand identity. From customizable themes and branding elements to personalized messaging, make every interaction with your customers an extension of your brand.3. Multi-Channel Distribution:– Reach customers wherever they are with our multi-channel distribution capabilities. Whether it’s through your website, mobile app, or social media platforms, our IBE ensures maximum visibility and accessibility for your travel offerings.4. Real-Time Inventory Management:– Stay ahead of the curve with real-time inventory updates. Our IBE syncs seamlessly with your inventory management system, providing accurate availability and pricing information to customers at all times.5. Comprehensive Reporting and Analytics:– Gain valuable insights into your business performance with our robust reporting and analytics tools. Track booking trends, monitor key metrics, and make data-driven decisions to optimize your operations and drive growth.6. Multi-Sourced Content Integration:– Gain access to a vast network of travel inventory from leading providers such as Galileo, Amadeus, TBO, Riya Travels, and Tripjack, all seamlessly integrated into our IBE. With a single platform, you’ll have access to a diverse range of flight, hotel, and car rental options, ensuring that your customers always findthe perfect travel solutions tailored to their needs.Benefits:Increase Revenue and Sales Conversion: Our IBE is designed to maximize your revenue potential by simplifying the booking process and providing a frictionless experience for customers, resulting in increased sales conversion rates.Enhance Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: Deliver exceptional customer experiences that keep travelers coming back for more. With our user-friendly interface and personalized booking options, you’ll foster long-term loyalty and satisfaction among your customer base.Streamline Operations and Reduce Costs: Automate manual processes, streamline operations, and reduce overhead costs with our efficient IBE. By optimizing your workflow, you’ll free up valuable time and resources to focus on delivering top-notch service to your customers.Why Choose Resh and Thosh’s IBE:Unparalleled Expertise and Support: – With years of experience in the travel technology industry, we’re not just a software provider – we’re your trusted partner in success. Our dedicated support team is here to guide you every step of the way, from implementation to ongoing optimization.Innovative Technology and Future-Proof Solutions: – Our IBE is built on the latest technology and industry best practices, ensuring reliability, security, and scalability for your business. With future-proof solutions that adapt to your evolving needs, you’ll stay ahead of the curve and remain competitive in the ever changing travel landscape.Access to Extensive Inventory:With multi-sourced content integration, you’ll have access to an extensive inventory of travel options from top providers in the industry. From major airlines to boutique hotels, our IBE ensures that your customers have access to the widest selection of travel options available.Enhanced Flexibility and Choice:Give your customers the freedom to choose from a diverse range of travel options, all from within a single platform. With content sourced from multiple providers, you’ll be able to offer unparalleled flexibility and choice, ensuring that every traveler finds the perfect itinerary to suit their preferences and budget.Ready to unlock the full potential of your travel business? Choose Resh and Thosh’s Internet Booking Engine and embark on a journey towards unparalleled success. Contact us today to schedule a demo and experience the difference for yourself!

sections.heading: Manual vs Automation
sections.content: Manual processes cost more due to high labor hours, slower output, and frequent errors, which increases overall operational expense.Automation reduces time, labor cost, and mistakes, allowing the same work to be completed faster and more accurately.ROI is calculated as: ROI = (Manual Cost – Automation Cost) / Automation Cost × 100 to measure how much value automation generates.If automation cost is ₹1,00,000 and it saves ₹60,000/month in manual work, the payback period is less than 2 months and ROI exceeds 300–500%.Overall, automation provides higher efficiency, lower cost, and faster scalability, delivering significant long-term financial and productivity benefits
